resources.string: The Metropolitan Theater where you will find the best cultural events in Medellin
the Teatro Pablo Tobón, a cultural center with 63 years of history, cultural heritage and architectural Medellin
The Teatro de la Universidad de Medellin, a perfect setting to enjoy great shows and events.
More than a restaurant we are one family, with local projection home, we provide a good family atmosphere
Quality, beauty, excellent service and a delicious menu. In Situ must for visitors in the city and people of Medellin
The passion for cooking and the desire to offer a different architectural space to what already existed in the city, enjoy leisure time
The Blue Hall adequate space with backline, lights, stage and dressing room, where you can enjoy the best concerts of rock city
Nuestro Bar is a place to watch, listen and enjoy local, national and international bands in all genres Rock derivatives
Yage BAR a place to share and make friends; a space to dream, to create and enjoy music that feeds our spirit

Lagoon Guarne it offers a few scenarios with natural landscapes and historical evaluation of the Valle de Aburra. In this space you can enjoy natural viewpoints towards the city, archaeological items such as fences, terraces and stone paths and natural attractions such as wetlands

The architectural project located Saint Dominic Savio College Northeast side of Medellin become a meeting place able to provide spaces for dialogue, fun and sharing of values between the person perimiter be in permanent contact with the landscape and pan the city

The Medellin Botanical Garden one of the most beautiful and important living museums of our country, is a place to relax and contemplate its enormous floral wealth, since it has the largest collection of orchids throughout the city, also home to more than 1,000 animal and plant species. An auditorium, library and museums.
